trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Wallingford
There were no other sightings in Wallingford on or around April 3rd 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home on 91 south around the wallingford\east haven line when i noticed what i thought was a star which began moving erratically in the sky. it was hard to gauge distance, but the object was very bright, moving at a high rate of speed with sudden turns. after a few seconds of movement, the object stopped and "dropped" or fell from the sky behind the treeline. again, i was driving and trying to concentrate on not going off the road. i tried to keep an eye on that area\direction to see if it came up but i did not see anything after that.
Summary: erratic flying object stopped then fell from sky
